pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i5 11400F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6600XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: One day, the game distribution site “ViruStream” was infected by a virus caused by hackers! Solve the riddles that the hacker gives you and remove the virus! Inspired by a certain experiential escape game, this is a puzzle-solving game with a time limit of 60 minutes!
